content.new:
for version 7.3.1, and when built from source, `gz topic -e /gazebo/deafult/valkyrie/joint_cmd` claims ``[Err] [gz_topic.cc:190] Unable to get message type for topic[/gazebo/default/valkyrie/joint_cmd]`

steps to reproduce:

    gazebo --verbose worl
content.old:
for version 7.3.1, and when built from source, `gz topic -e /gazebo/deafult/my_model/joint_cmd` claims ``[Err] [gz_topic.cc:190] Unable to get message type for topic[/gazebo/default/valkyrie/joint_cmd]`

steps to reproduce:

    gazebo --verbose worl

issue.title: gz topic -e doesn't wait for messages to be published
